001package edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.controller;
002
003import android.graphics.Color;
004import android.graphics.drawable.Drawable;
005import android.media.MediaPlayer;
006import android.os.Bundle;
007import android.util.Log;
008import android.view.MotionEvent;
009import android.view.View;
010import android.widget.AdapterView;
011import android.widget.AdapterView.OnItemSelectedListener;
012import android.widget.ArrayAdapter;
013import android.widget.Button;
014import android.widget.ImageView;
015import android.widget.TextView;
016import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
017import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity;
018import androidx.core.content.res.ResourcesCompat;
019import androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner;
020import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
021import com.google.android.material.slider.Slider;
022import com.google.android.material.slider.Slider.OnChangeListener;
023import dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint;
024import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.R;
025import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.databinding.ActivityGameBinding;
026import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.GameField;
027import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.entity.Score;
028import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.entity.User;
029import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.viewmodel.GameFieldViewModel;
030import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.viewmodel.ScoreViewModel;
031import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.viewmodel.UserViewModel;
032import java.time.Instant;
033import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
034
035@AndroidEntryPoint
036public class GameActivity extends AppCompatActivity {
037
038  GameField gameField;
039  ImageView imageViewPhoto;
040  MediaPlayer mediaPlayer;
041  MediaPlayer mediaPlayer2;
042  MediaPlayer mediaPlayer3;
043  int background = 1;
044  ImageView imageViewShip;
045  TextView levelView;
046  TextView counterView;
047  Button moveUp;
048  int Measuredwidth = 0;
049  int Measuredheight = 0;
050  Boolean inProgress;
051  int score;
052  int counter = 1;
053  GameFieldViewModel gameFieldViewModel;
054  private ActivityGameBinding binding;
055  private UserViewModel userViewModel;
056  private ScoreViewModel scoreViewModel;
057  private User currentUser;
058
059
060  @Override
061  public boolean onTouchEvent(MotionEvent event) {
062    imageViewPhoto = findViewById(R.id.profile_photo);
063    return super.onTouchEvent(event);
064  }
065
066
067  @Override
068  protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
069    super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
070    binding = ActivityGameBinding.inflate(getLayoutInflater());
071    setContentView(binding.getRoot());
072    mediaPlayer3 = MediaPlayer.create(this, R.raw.explosion2);
073    setup();
074    gameButtons();
075  }
076
077  @Override
078  protected void onDestroy() {
079    super.onDestroy();
080    if (mediaPlayer != null) {
081      mediaPlayer.release();
082      mediaPlayer = null;
083    }
084    if (mediaPlayer2 != null) {
085      mediaPlayer2.release();
086      mediaPlayer2 = null;
087    }
088    if (mediaPlayer3 != null) {
089      mediaPlayer3.release();
090      mediaPlayer3 = null;
091    }
092
093  }
094
095  private void gameButtons() {
096    binding.play.setOnClickListener((view) -> {
097      gameFieldViewModel.run();
098      binding.pause.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
099      binding.pause.setEnabled(true);
100      binding.moveUp.setEnabled(true);
101      binding.moveDown.setEnabled(true);
102      binding.shoot.setEnabled(true);
103      binding.play.setVisibility(View.INVISIBLE);
104      mediaPlayer2 = MediaPlayer.create(this, R.raw.intro);
105      mediaPlayer2.start();
106    });
107    binding.pause.setOnClickListener((view) -> {
108      binding.play.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
109      binding.moveUp.setEnabled(false);
110      binding.moveDown.setEnabled(false);
111      binding.shoot.setEnabled(false);
112      binding.pause.setVisibility(View.INVISIBLE);
113      gameFieldViewModel.paused();
114    });
115    binding.moveUp.setOnClickListener((view) -> {
116      gameFieldViewModel.shipMoveUp();
117    });
118    binding.moveDown.setOnClickListener((view) -> gameFieldViewModel.shipMoveDown());
119    binding.shoot.setOnClickListener((view) -> {
120      gameFieldViewModel.shoot();
121      mediaPlayer = MediaPlayer.create(this, R.raw.shoot);
122      mediaPlayer.start();
123    });
124    binding.velocity.addOnChangeListener(new OnChangeListener() {
125      @Override
126      public void onValueChange(@NonNull @NotNull Slider slider, float value, boolean fromUser) {
127        gameFieldViewModel.setVelocity(value);
128        //System.out.println(value);
129      }
130    });
131    binding.angle.addOnChangeListener(new OnChangeListener() {
132      @Override
133      public void onValueChange(@NonNull @NotNull Slider slider, float value, boolean fromUser) {
134        gameFieldViewModel.setAngle((int) value);
135        //System.out.println(value);
136      }
137    });
138
139    binding.gravity.setBackgroundColor(Color.parseColor("#FFFFFF"));
140    binding.gravity.setAdapter(new ArrayAdapter<>(this, R.layout.spinner_item,
141        getResources().getStringArray(R.array.gravity_array)));
142    binding.gravity.setOnItemSelectedListener(new OnItemSelectedListener() {
143      @Override
144      public void onItemSelected(AdapterView<?> parent, View view, int position, long id) {
145        String value = binding.gravity.getSelectedItem().toString();
146        //System.out.println(value);
147        switch (value) {
148          case "Moon":
149            gameFieldViewModel.setGravity(1.6);
150            break;
151          case "Mercury", "Mars":
152            gameFieldViewModel.setGravity(3.7);
153            break;
154          case "Uranus":
155            gameFieldViewModel.setGravity(8.7);
156            break;
157          case "Venus":
158            gameFieldViewModel.setGravity(8.9);
159            break;
160          case "Saturn":
161            gameFieldViewModel.setGravity(9);
162            break;
163          case "Earth":
164            gameFieldViewModel.setGravity(9.8);
165            break;
166          case "Neptune":
167            gameFieldViewModel.setGravity(11);
168            break;
169          case "Jupiter":
170            gameFieldViewModel.setGravity(23.1);
171            break;
172          case "Sun":
173            gameFieldViewModel.setGravity(274);
174            break;
175        }
176
177      }
178
179      @Override
180      public void onNothingSelected(AdapterView<?> parent) {
181        gameFieldViewModel.setGravity(9.8);
182      }
183    });
184  }
185
186  private void setup() {
187    binding.pause.setVisibility(View.INVISIBLE);
188    binding.moveUp.setEnabled(false);
189    binding.moveDown.setEnabled(false);
190    binding.shoot.setEnabled(false);
191    ViewModelProvider viewModelProvider = new ViewModelProvider(this);
192    gameFieldViewModel = viewModelProvider.get(GameFieldViewModel.class);
193    //Log.i("GameActivity", "Initialized");
194    gameFieldViewModel
195        .getGameField()
196        .observe(this, (field) -> {
197          if (gameField != field) {
198            binding.gameView.setGameField(field);
199            gameField = field;
200          }
201          int level = gameField.getLevel();
202          binding.gameView.invalidate();
203          binding.level.setText(String.valueOf(level));
204          binding.counter.setText(String.valueOf(gameField.getCounter()));
205          score = gameField.getCounter() * 50;
206          if (this.counter == gameField.getCounter()) {
207            mediaPlayer = MediaPlayer.create(this, R.raw.explosion2);
208            mediaPlayer.start();
209            this.counter++;
210          }
211          binding.scoreValueText.setText(String.valueOf(score));
212          Drawable b = switch ((level - 1) % 3 + 1) {
213            case 1 ->
214                ResourcesCompat.getDrawable(getResources(), R.drawable.play_background1, null);
215            case 2 -> ResourcesCompat.getDrawable(getResources(), R.drawable.img_1, null);
216            case 3 -> ResourcesCompat.getDrawable(getResources(), R.drawable.img, null);
217            default -> null;
218          };
219          if (b != null) {
220            binding.gameConstraint.setBackground(b);
221          }
222
223        });
224    gameFieldViewModel.getInProgress()
225        .observe(this, (inProgress) -> {
226          Log.d(getClass().getSimpleName(), "inProgress=" + inProgress);
227          if (Boolean.TRUE.equals(this.inProgress) && Boolean.FALSE.equals(inProgress)) {
228            Drawable b = ResourcesCompat.getDrawable(getResources(), R.drawable.play_background1,
229                null);
230            binding.gameConstraint.setBackground(b);
231            mediaPlayer3.start();
232            addScores();
233            finish();
234          }
235          this.inProgress = inProgress;
236        });
237    setupUserViewModel(viewModelProvider, this);
238    setupScoreViewModel(viewModelProvider, this);
239  }
240
241
242  private void setupUserViewModel(ViewModelProvider provider, LifecycleOwner owner) {
243    userViewModel = provider
244        .get(UserViewModel.class);
245    userViewModel
246        .getCurrentUser()
247        .observe(owner, (user) -> this.currentUser = user);
248  }
249
250  private void setupScoreViewModel(ViewModelProvider provider, LifecycleOwner owner) {
251    scoreViewModel = provider
252        .get(ScoreViewModel.class);
253    // TODO: 10/26/23 Observe scoreId or Score from view model.
254  }
255
256  private void addScores() {
257    Score score = new Score();
258    score.setStarted(Instant.now());
259    score.setValue(this.score);
260    score.setPlayer_id(currentUser.getId());
261    scoreViewModel.save(score, currentUser);
262  }
263
264
265}
